scripts.test:lighthouse: powershell -Command "if (!(Test-Path 'reports')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'reports' }; npx lighthouse http://localhost:3000 --output html --output-path ./reports/lighthouse-report.html"
scripts.test:lighthouse:a11y: powershell -Command "if (!(Test-Path 'reports')) { New-Item -ItemType Directory -Path 'reports' }; npx lighthouse http://localhost:3000 --only-categories=accessibility --output html --output-path ./reports/lighthouse-a11y.html"
scripts.test:all: npm run test:a11y && echo 'Testes de acessibilidade concluídos'
